channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: Running wsl commands using system2() function in R
item.description: Using “wsl” command in system2() to run commands in wsl system2("wsl", "cd ~/bioinfor/; ls", stdout = TRUE) ## [1] "AF086833.gb" "RNASeqByExample" "chr22.fa" We can retrieve the SARS-coronavirus 2 gene sequences using efetch system2("wsl","efetch -db=nuccore -format=gb -id=NC_045512", stdout = "../../../NC_045512.gb") system2("wsl", "cat ../../../NC_045512.gb | head", stdout = TRUE) ## [1] "LOCUS NC_045512 29903 bp ss-RNA linear VRL 18-JUL-2020" ## [2] "DEFINITION Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 isolate Wuhan-Hu-1," ## [3] " complete genome.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.
